page.title: 18Recreation, Murroes area
page.content: There are two{football}teams in the Murroes area.There are the amateurs and a Mattocks school team.There are two football pitches,one in Wellbank and one at Murroes.In June there are the five-a-side with the final at the fete. Wellbank has a{playpark.}It has swings,a chute and a tennis court. There is a youth club with snooker,darts and table tennis. The men have a club as well with bowls and darts.There is the{Rural (Women's } {Rural Institute)}for the ladies.There are Brownies in Murroes, Guides, Brownies, Cubs and Scouts in Wellbank. Many people have outdoor hobbies like gardening,football,tennis and horse riding.
